short_summary: Elevator maintenance services for the Canadian Space Agency's 4-storey building in St-Hubert, QC.
description: The following job requires the services of a company to perform ongoing maintenance on 6 hydraulic elevators serving its 4-storey building at 6767 route de l'Aeroport in St-Hubert. duration for the services: 2 years + 8 optional years that could be activated and elective site visit at Canadian Space Agency, 6767 Route de l'Aeroport, St-Hubert, J3Y 8Y9 the site visit will begin at 10 am., interested parties who would like to request for more details must contact with the Contracting Authority no later than November 8, 2023 at 2 pm and confirm their attendance and provide. the services of a company needs to perform a highly technical tasks, such as maintenance and operation of an architectural feature which can result in minor aesthetic damage to CANSA headquarters. full_summary:
### Request forProposal: Elevator Maintenance Service

**Reference Number**: cb-455-8891825

**Amendment Number**: 4

**Solicitation Number**: 9F030-23-0209

**Publication Date**: 2023-11-02

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-17 14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-01

**Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-11-30

### Tender Details

For the purpose of conducting ongoing maintenance on our 4-storey building's hydraulic elevators, the Canadian Space Agency invites tenders for a request for proposal for elevator maintenance services.

This tender requires the services of a company to perform periodic inspections and maintenance work on six hydraulic elevators at our location in Saint-Hubert, Quebec. 

### Tender Process

**Competitive Bid Process**

* **Opening Date of Tender Period**: 2023-11-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-17 14:00:00

**Optional Site Visit**

A site visit will take place on November 9, 2023, at 10:00 am. Bidders must communicate their attendance to the contracting authority by November 8, 2023, 14:00.

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Contract Period

The initial contract period will be 2 years, with 8 optional years available for activation.

### Notice and Attachments

To obtain tender documents, please visit [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23862/9f030-23-0209--request-for-proposal-%28rfp---elevator-maintenance-service_0.pdf) for English and [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23862/p1127d16738r1---devis-entretien_0.pdf) for French.

### Bidder Contact Information

Mélanie Séguin  
melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca  
(438) 364-1399  

Please feel free to contact Mélanie Séguin for any questions related to this tender.  



Your final output should be accompanied by a link to a Google Document and a paragraph that explains the reasoning behind your decisions. 

Link: [Your Google Document Link]
